message: @issackelly there are only a couple choices, and I think only one with A/C

One possibility we didn't pursue last year was of getting OSU dorm space for PyOhio attendees.  It's the best price people can get nearby, but PyOhio has to upfront and collect the money.  Also, some people who used them for YAPC last year had some complaints.
sure.  dorm != hotel in much of any terms.  Can you request which dorm?
The Blackwell is nice, and we have gotten a good conference rate from them in the past - $100ish, good for a fancy hotel, but still more than many attendees want to pay
The blackwell permitted me to reserve for just Saturday night at the PyOhio rate.
